channel.title: HELP! when i try to open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box
channel.description: OKAY when i open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box but right away it goes back down!! it used to work before, but i needed to compile and somone said edit my envirment lables and when i went to edit them Path and classpath wasnt there.. so i added both of them and put in what it said 2 on one of the guides 2 make a server and it still didnt work with my compiling then i went to go put my server back on and it didnt work! i need alot of help.. and i hope there is a simple answer.. please help sombody?

item.title: HELP! when i try to open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

okay well uh, java i put in ur path and classpath but changed it to my JDK and still it didnt work, this really sucks and i wish i could change it back… cause all i did was add ‘path’ and ‘classpath’ to the system variables then it ddnt work… i changed the path and classpath to what i believe was exactly the same as before and i was running my server before then i couldnt afterwards… is there like a way 2 run it from the command prompt thing? sence i mean… the box that pops up from that is the command prompt unless im wrong :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 09:45:54 PM[/size][hr]im pretty damn sure i have the right java… and what do you mean by system restore/reformating? im not very smart i guess…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 10:27:05 PM[/size][hr]cmon som1 can explain this 2 me

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! when i try to open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

ok guys the path and shit dont listen to that thats one of the ways to run the server do this
right click edit on compile

delete all of it and copy this

@echo off
COLOR 08
title My Fixed Compiler Fixed Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
paus

then compile it then run server hope it helps

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! when i try to open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

they are.

CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

jdk1.6.0_01 <—change the _01 to you’re JDK

PATH - :\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin

jdk1.6.0_01 <—Again change the _01 to you’re JDK

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! when i try to open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

3 possible thing.

1.) Wrong CLASSPATH, and PATH
2.) Reboot After adding Variables
3.) Download Java Jdk 6u7-7u10 and then try again.
